name: bLife
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 52

A game about a bee and life.

Harvest flowers or visit hives to regain health.

Made in less than 24 hours (due to limited time). There's no real point to this game except experiencing life. Was tired of making fast paced games, and wanted to really explore what made me get into games in the first place.

[My YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@samyam) (will post a devlog soon) https://www.youtube.com/@samyam


Unfortunately I didn't have time to optimize for WebGL
